author: ianna
body:
- Replace a problematic shape with an identical one

A new shape is in red, the old one is in blue (note, subtracted wings are not clearly shown due to a precision error):
![screenshot 2016-08-31 10 50 22](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1390682/18123211/2930bd74-6f6d-11e6-9395-b1538791f456.png)
title: Replace a Subtraction Solid with a Union Solid
